dt-example.title: Button ordering
dt-example.info: The list of columns that ColVis displays has two options for the order in which they are displayed. The default mode of operation is to show the buttons in the same order as they appear in the HTML table, but the second mode of operation is to show the buttons in alphabetical order. This is done by specifying the `order` option, set to `alpha`. Alphabetical button ordering is shown in this example.
